AppraiseData.Title: 鼓励一下吧
AppraiseData.Message: 给个好评吧,您的评价是我们进步的动力!

AppraiseData_en.Title: Rate Homeschool
AppraiseData_en.Message: If you enjoy using Homeschool, would you mind to take a moment to rate it? Thanks for your support!

versionUpdata.message: 新版本已发布,是否前往更新？

versionUpdata_en.message: New version is availble for downloading.

Photo.Title: 无法保存照片到相册
Photo.Message: 请在"设置-隐私-照片"选项中，允许读伴访问你的手机相册

Photo_en.Title: Can't save photos to the album
Photo_en.Message: Go to "Setting"-"Privacy"-"Photos" , allow Home to access your photos

Microphone.Title: 无法录音
Microphone.Message: 请在"设置-隐私-麦克风"选项中，允许读伴访问你的手机麦克风

Microphone_en.Title: Can't record
Microphone_en.Message: Go to "Setting"-"Privacy"-"Microphone" , allow Home to access your Microphone

Push.Title: 无法接收推送消息
Push.Message: 请在"设置-通知"选项中，允许读伴通知

Push_en.Title: Can't receive notifications
Push_en.Message: Go to "Setting"-"Notifications" , allow Home to access your notifications

Network.Title: 没有网络使用权限
Network.Message: 请在"设置-通知"选项中，允许读伴通知

Network_en.Title: Can't receive notifications
Network_en.Message: Go to "Setting"-"Notifications" , allow Home to access your notifications

Addicted.Text: 你已经在线超过20分钟了哦，休息一下吧！
